description: Write a function that checks if an IPv4 `ip_str` falls within any `reserved_ranges`. `reserved_ranges` is a NULL-terminated array of CIDR strings. Example (Blocked): is_ip_in_ranges("192.0.2.1", ["192.0.2.0/24", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Public): is_ip_in_ranges("8.8.8.8", ["192.0.2.0/24", NULL]) -> 0.
